item.title: Building Wireshark from source
item.description: Download and build 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 git clone https://gitlab.com/wireshark/wireshark sudo wireshark/tools/./debian-setup.sh --install-qt5-deps (--install-optional) cd wireshark mkdir build cd build cmake .. -DUSE_qt6=OFF make -j$(nproc) sudo make install
